sentences.en: After the excellent meal, we were satiated with food and drink.
sentences.cn: 享用了那顿丰盛的美餐之后, 我们都酒足饭饱了.

sentences.en: But the vengeance of Juno was not yet satiated.
sentences.cn: 但是朱诺报复之心不死.

sentences.en: For I have satiated the weary soul, and I have replenished every sorrowful soul.
sentences.cn: 25疲乏的人, 我使他饱饫.愁烦的人,我使他知足.

sentences.en: He was satiated with rich food and luxious living.
sentences.cn: 他对肥腻的食品和豪华的生活感到很满足.

sentences.en: Oh , thank you; we were satiated with your delicious food.
sentences.cn: 谢谢, 我们对你可口的食物感到非常满足.

sentences.en: She finished the meal and sat back with a satiated sigh.
sentences.cn: 她用完餐，往椅背上一靠，心满意足地叹了口气。

sentences.en: She pushed her chair back from the table, satiated.
sentences.cn: 她把椅子从餐桌处向后挪了挪, 再也吃不下了.

sentences.en: She was so satiated with bananas that she would not even look at one.
sentences.cn: 她已吃腻了香蕉,她甚至连看都不想看一眼.

sentences.en: She was so satiated with bananas that she would not even look at other one.
sentences.cn: 她对香蕉很满意,甚至不看一眼其他的.

sentences.en: The actor is so vain that he can never Be satiated with adulation.
sentences.cn: 那个演员太爱虚荣以致奉承已不能使他满足.

sentences.en: The girl was so satiated with bananas that she would not even look at one.
sentences.cn: 这女孩吃香蕉吃腻了,见了它连看都不想看.

sentences.en: The Vengeance of Juno was not yet satiated.
Zuo Quan Su - walnut production to nuts satiated, thin, big, wei xiang known.
sentences.cn: 左权产的核桃素以果仁饱满 、 皮薄 、 个大 、 味香而著称.

trans.tran_cn: 厌倦的， 生腻的； 充分满足的
充分满足，使厌腻( satiate的过去式和过去分词 )
